DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal identify best practice improve health outcome patient asthma use comparative effectiveness research within Agency Healthcare Research Quality ( AHRQ ) Practice-Based Research Network ( PBRN ) . This goal achieve complete follow aim : ( 1 ) Create centralized database comparative effectiveness research asthma combine clinical billing data one large healthcare system country ( Carolinas Healthcare System ) data school system , Medicaid , patient community-level datasets ; ( 2 ) Deploy fully develop integrated approach asthma management base Chronic Care Model ; ( 3 ) Develop implement `` share decision making '' approach asthmatic patient disadvantage background ; ( 4 ) Implement electronic data collection system exist CDC fund school-based asthma intervention allow program evaluation link school nurse provider ; ( 5 ) Evaluate compare effectiveness three asthma management strategy : overall healthcare consumption medical cost ; quality life , school absenteeism performance ; asthma clinical measure ; medication utilization ; ( 6 ) Disseminate finding across state via statewide PBRN network partner . This project potential impact 30,000 asthma patient across Carolinas include many patient disadvantage background .
DOC.brief_title: Title : Comparative Effectiveness Asthma Interventions Within AHRQ PBRN
